Title: Be Careful of Stones That You Throw
Plot: Rayna and Juliette are locked for their tour. When Rayna suggests taking her girls with her, she finds that Lamar's not above holding her hostage with some long forgotten family secrets. To everyone's surprise Juliette and Sean have eloped, though not everyone is celebrating. Deacon reconnects with a former flame, and Avery follows the advice of a new music producer that puts more space between him, the band and Scarlett.
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
GuestStars: Judith Hoag, Michiel Huisman, Yara Martinez, Wyclef Jean, Chloe Bennet, Nicholas Strong, Tilky Jones, Sylvia Jefferies, Daniel Buran, David Alford, Ed Amatrudo, Kourtney Hansen
